Issue.creator: vladimirwork
Issue.summary: We should update revocation registry delta value during REG_ENTRY_REVOC writing
Issue.description: We should update revocation registry delta during REG_ENTRY_REVOC writing by sending registry revocation reading txn (that will be implemented in scope of INDY-1356) because if writing txn is failed the next txns to write are rejected due to incorrect revocation registry delta.
